snippet: Mr. Rees-Mogg was one of Britain’s most respected, if mercurial, conservative voices, rising to the defense of Richard Nixon as well as the Rolling Stones.
abstract: William Rees-Mogg, longtime editor of The Times of London and one of Britain's most respected conservative voices, dies at age 84.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Rees-Mogg was one of Britain’s most respected, if mercurial, conservative voices, rising to the defense of Richard Nixon as well as the Rolling Stones.

headline.seo: William Rees-Mogg, Former Editor of The Times of London, Dies at 84
headline.main: William Rees-Mogg, Ex-Editor of The Times of London, Dies at 84
headline.print_headline: William Rees-Mogg, 84, Ex-Editor of The Times of London
